settings.question: Do I need to register for the warranty?
settings.answer: There is no need to enlist as your purchase shall warrant automatically. Just keep your receipt as evidence.

settings.question: Can I transfer the warranty if I gift the jewelry?
settings.answer: Yes, the warranty can be assigned to a new possessor along with the original invoice.

settings.question: What happens if the problem is not covered within the warranty?
settings.answer: We provide low-cost repair services on problems that are not covered under warranty. Kindly call us for the estimates.

settings.question: Does resizing void the warranty?
settings.answer: Resizing by Stienhardt & Stones does not affect the warranty. Resizing by other parties may.

settings.question: How long does a repair take?
settings.answer: 10 – 14 business days is the manufacturer’s usual standard for the warranty repairs; the period may however depend on the complexity of the problem.

settings.question: Is the warranty valid for international purchases?
settings.answer: Yes, we have no geographical restrictions for our Manufacturing Warranty. However, the warranty from our Manufacturing Cover does not eliminate the shipping charges for international customers.

settings.all-sold-out-text: Please choose and update the products as per availability!
settings.guest-customer-message: Please login to save your wishlist
